channel.title: Comments on: Berry Tart
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: By: Tiffany Stout
item.dc:creator: Tiffany Stout
item.description: Berry tart is pretty good. It’s sweet and smooth and definitely Berry but it kind of reminds me of berry flavored children’s Tylenol for some reason. Not a bad thing just was not expected that comparison to pop into my head. I would probably buy again though.
item.content:encoded: Berry tart is pretty good. It’s sweet and smooth and definitely Berry but it kind of reminds me of berry flavored children’s Tylenol for some reason. Not a bad thing just was not expected that comparison to pop into my head. I would probably buy again though.

item.title: By: joseph
item.dc:creator: joseph
item.description: I love this juice , its great all day , I enjoy how the flavor changes when drinking coffee , a must have for any coffee lover or anyone looking for a solid all day vape juice.
item.content:encoded: I love this juice , its great all day , I enjoy how the flavor changes when drinking coffee , a must have for any coffee lover or anyone looking for a solid all day vape juice.

item.title: By: SxyFireGrl24
item.dc:creator: SxyFireGrl24
item.description: This is by far the best e-liquid I have every had. Everytime I buy my fluid, I have to have this flavor. If you like Berries, this is your flavor!
item.content:encoded: This is by far the best e-liquid I have every had. Everytime I buy my fluid, I have to have this flavor. If you like Berries, this is your flavor!

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Another outstanding flavor combination from CC! The description is spot on. Definitely adding this to my top ADV list.
item.content:encoded: Another outstanding flavor combination from CC! The description is spot on. Definitely adding this to my top ADV list.

item.title: By: Kelly Womack Randis
item.dc:creator: Kelly Womack Randis
item.description: Really enjoy this flavor. Reminds me of the taste of Smarties
item.content:encoded: Really enjoy this flavor. Reminds me of the taste of Smarties
